snippet.title: Sulfur - New Gameplay Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
Sulfur is a singleplayer extraction FPS with a charming and cartoony art style. Fight your way through levels to collect new guns, gear, and loot, and if you die before you safely extract, you'll lose it all. This new trailer for Sulfur was shown at the PC Gaming Show 2023, and you can read more at PC Gamer.

www.pcgamer.com

PC Gamer is the global authority on PC games. We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
